### A Very Simple HTML Template Engine

Installation:

	npm install fitemp

In HTML

	<script src="./fitemp.js"></script>

API
	
	
	<ul>
	<%  for(var i = 0; i < year.length; i++){ %>
	    <li><%year[i]%>年大吉</li>
	<% } %>
	</ul>
	//-----
	var tpl = require('fitemp');
	tpl.render(id,{
		year:	['鼠','牛','虎','兔','龙','蛇','马','羊','猴','鸡','狗','猪']
	/*		
     * @param id or html str    
	*/
	});
